message.content:
I'll calculate each of the requested financial ratios and metrics step-by-step based on the provided financial statements.

### 1. Current Ratio
Current Ratio = Total Current Assets / Total Current Liabilities
Current Ratio = $10,022,038.12 / $967,271.87 = 10.36

### 2. Gross Profit Margin
Gross Profit Margin = (Gross Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%
Gross Profit Margin = ($1,713,437.82 / $3,025,437.82) × 100% = 56.63%

### 3. Debt to Asset Ratio
Debt to Asset Ratio = Total Liabilities / Total Assets
Debt to Asset Ratio = $967,271.87 / $14,930,535.06 = 0.06

### 4. Net Profit Margin
Net Profit Margin = (Net Profit / Total Revenue) × 100%
Net Profit Margin = ($963,263.19 / $3,025,437.82) × 100% = 31.84%

### 5. Cash to Current Debt Ratio
Cash to Current Debt Ratio = (Cash on Hand + Bank Deposits) / Total Current Liabilities
Cash to Current Debt Ratio = ($3,537,257.19 + $4,579,000.00) / $967,271.87 = $8,116,257.19 / $967,271.87 = 8.39

### 6. Free Cash Flow (FCF)
Free Cash Flow = Net Cash Flow from Operating Activities - Capital Expenditures
Free Cash Flow = $116,257.19 - $0.00 = $116,257.19

### 7. Return on Assets (ROA)
ROA = (Net Profit / Total Assets) × 100%
ROA = ($963,263.19 / $14,930,535.06) × 100% = 6.45%

```json
{"solution": {'Current Ratio': '10.36', 'Gross Profit Margin': '56.63%', 'Debt to Asset Ratio': '0.06', 'Net Profit Margin': '31.84%', 'Cash to Current Debt Ratio': '8.39', 'Free Cash Flow (FCF)': '116257.19', 'Return on Assets (ROA)': '6.45%'} }
```
